attributes.action: REVIEW THE PAY SCALES FOR ADMIN STAFF.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ALTHOUGH EVERYONE KNOWS THAT ANY COMPANY WOULD BE LOST WITHOUT IT'S ADMIN STAFF, I FIND THAT ANYONE IN ADMIN IS PAID THE LOWEST IN ALL COMPANIES.  IN SHORT THEY DO ALL THE DONKEY WORK AND OTHERS GET THE WAGES AND THE PRAISE.

Caroline Richards-Rhiney

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
